languages.text: {n}Вы ловите благодарный взгляд Джиневри, после чего молодая блюстительница ободряюще улыбается ветерану.{/n} "Пойдем, Кляйн, научишь молодежь брюхо мутантам вспарывать. Я захвачу респираторы, так точно ничего не подцепим".
languages.translation_comment: после куя Кляйн и Джиневра уходят, зтм
после куя Кляйн и Джиневра уходят, зтм

languages.text: {n}You catch Jinevri's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы ловите благодарный взгляд Джиневри, после чего молодая блюстительница ободряюще улыбается ветерану.{/n} "Пойдем, Кляйн, научишь молодежь брюхо мутантам вспарывать. Я захвачу респираторы, так точно ничего не подцепим".

traits.locale_text: {n}You catch Jinevra's grateful glance, then you watch her smile at Klein encouragingly.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

{n}You catch Jinevra's grateful glance, then you watch her smile at Klein encouragingly.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

{n}You catch Jinevra's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

{n}You catch Jinevra's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

{n}You catch Jinevri's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

{n}You catch Jinevri's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

languages.text: {n}Vous surprenez le regard reconnaissant de Jinevri alors qu'elle adresse un sourire d'encouragement à Klein.{/n} « Haut les cœurs, Klein, à charge pour vous d'apprendre aux béjaunes l'art et la manière de bien équarrir les mutants. Je vais nous chercher des respirateurs, de manière à éviter tout risque de contamination. »
languages.original_text: {n}You catch Jinevri's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous surprenez le regard reconnaissant de Jinevra alors qu'elle adresse un sourire d'encouragement à Klein.{/n} « Haut les cœurs, Klein, à charge pour vous d'apprendre aux béjaunes l'art et la manière de bien équarrir les mutants. Je vais nous chercher des respirateurs, de manière à éviter tout risque de contamination. »

languages.text: {n}Aciertas a ver la gratitud en la mirada de Jinevri, y después observas la sonrisa alentadora que dedica a Klein.{/n} «Vamos, Klein, tienes que enseñar a los novatos a abrir mutantes. Traeré un par de respiradores para que no nos peguen nada».
languages.original_text: {n}You catch Jinevri's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aciertas a ver la gratitud en la mirada de Jinevra, y después observas la sonrisa alentadora que dedica a Klein.{/n} «Vamos, Klein, tienes que enseñar a los novatos a abrir mutantes. Traeré un par de respiradores para que no nos peguen nada».

languages.text: {n}你注意到杰尼娃脸上感激的神情，之后她对克莱因露出了鼓励的微笑。{/n}“来吧，克莱因，你可以教那些新手怎么解剖变种人。我去拿两副呼吸器来，确保咱们不会被传染上什么病症。”
languages.original_text: {n}You catch Jinevri's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到杰尼娃脸上感激的神情，之后她对克莱因露出了鼓励的微笑。{/n}“来吧，克莱因，你可以教那些新手怎么解剖变种人。我去拿两副呼吸器来，确保咱们不会被传染上什么病症。”

languages.text: {n}ジネヴリが感謝の表情を浮かべた。すると、彼女がクラインを励ますように微笑んだ。{/n}「さあ、クライン。新米たちに変異体の切り刻み方を教えてやってくれ。変なものを吸い込まないように、私が人工呼吸器を持ってくる」
languages.original_text: {n}You catch Jinevri's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジネブラのありがたそうな表情を見た。すると、彼女がクラインを励ますように微笑んだ。{/n} 「さあ、クライン。変異体の切り刻み方を教えてやってくれ。病気をもらわないように、私が人工呼吸器を持ってくる」

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst Jinevris dankbaren Blick und siehst dann zu, wie sie Klein aufmunternd anlächelt.{/n} "Kommt, Klein, zeigt diesen Grünschnäbeln mal, wie man Mutanten aufschneidet. Ich hole uns ein paar Atemmasken, damit wir uns nichts einfangen."
languages.original_text: {n}You catch Jinevri's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst Jinevras dankbaren Blick und siehst dann zu, wie sie Klein aufmunternd anlächelt.{/n} "Kommt, klein, zeigt diesen Grünschnäbeln mal, wie man Mutanten aufschneidet. Ich hole uns ein paar Atemmasken, damit wir uns nichts einfangen."

languages.text: {n}Jinevri'nin minnettar bakışlarını yakalıyorsun. Ardından Klein'a cesaret vererek gülümsediğini görüyorsun.{/n} "Hadi Klein, acemilere nasıl mutant kesildiğini öğretsen iyi olacak. Bize iki tane solunum maskesi ayarlayayım da mikrop kapmayalım."
languages.original_text: {n}You catch Jinevri's grateful look, then watch as she smiles encouragingly at Klein.{/n} "Come on, Klein, you'd better teach the greenhorns how to carve up mutants. I'll grab us a pair of respirators to make sure we don't catch anything."
